Goal: Learn and experiment with the different components of a website

Plan:

First stage:

  1. learn the basics of html and css

  2. Learn the components one by one and try experimenting with your jekyll raw website.

  • font family
  • font size
  • padding
  • margins
  • flexbox
  • grid
  • text decoration
  • border
  • font weight
  • color
  • background color
  • text decoration
  • display
  • inset
  • left
  • right
  • top
  • bottom
  • outline
  1. try making a raw website using these components
  2. try css frameworks like bootstrap
